mapper.insert: insert into assets (community_id, assets_no, assets_name, assets_brand, assets_price, assets_number, assets_buytime, assets_life, create_time, is_del) values (#{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetsBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{assetsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{assetsBuytime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{assetsLife,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update assets
community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assets_no = #{assetsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assets_name = #{assetsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assets_brand = #{assetsBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assets_price = #{assetsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
assets_number = #{assetsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
assets_buytime = #{assetsBuytime,jdbcType=DATE},
assets_life = #{assetsLife,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where assets_id = #{assetsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update assets set community_id = #{communityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assets_no = #{assetsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assets_name = #{assetsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assets_brand = #{assetsBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assets_price = #{assetsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, assets_number = #{assetsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, assets_buytime = #{assetsBuytime,jdbcType=DATE}, assets_life = #{assetsLife,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where assets_id = #{assetsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from assets where assets_buytime BETWEEN #{search.startDay} AND #{search.endDay} AND assets_name like concat(concat('%',#{search.ownerName},'%')) and is_del=1
